# The `LazyValueInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass computes, caches, and vends lazy value constraint information. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LazyValueInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This pass computes, caches, and vends lazy value constraint information.

  prototype={<>Constant &#42; LazyValueInfo::getPredicateAt (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> Pred, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; C, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; CxtI, bool UseBlockValue)</>}>
Determine whether the specified value comparison with a constant is known to be true or false at the specified instruction.

<code>Pred</code> is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst">CmpInst</a> predicate. If <code>UseBlockValue</code> is true, the block value is also taken into account.

### getPredicateAt() {#a3296ab5af4e3c77a57810f97ab19e088}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; LazyValueInfo::getPredicateAt (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> Pred, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; LHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; RHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; CxtI, bool UseBlockValue)</>}>
Determine whether the specified value comparison is known to be true or false at the specified instruction.

While this takes two <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>&#39;s, it still requires that one of them is a constant. <code>Pred</code> is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst">CmpInst</a> predicate. If <code>UseBlockValue</code> is true, the block value is also taken into account.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-h/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-h">LazyValueInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-cpp/#l01989">1989</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-cpp">LazyValueInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
